scraped_articles.content:
32 Quotes About Daughters to Express Your Love and Pride

These quotes illustrate how daughters bring joy and laughter to their parents' lives.

32 Quotes About Daughters to Express Your Love and Pride

Daughters are special and loved by their families in unique ways.

They are often seen as precious gifts, full of potential and dreams.

That‚Äôs why many people have shared beautiful quotes about daughters that capture the bond between parents and their daughters.

Quotes about daughters mostly talk about the love, dreams, and hopes parents have for them.

These quotes also illustrate how daughters bring joy and laughter to their parents' lives.

Whether you're looking for a way to express your love for her or simply want to read some heartwarming words, look no further!¬†

We‚Äôve compiled a list of quotes about daughter that serve as inspiration.

Check this out!

Heartwarming Quotes About Daughters

  • ‚ÄúLittle girls are cute and small only to adults. To one another they are not cute. They are life-sized.‚Äù ‚Äî Margaret Atwood

  • ‚ÄúHaving a little girl has been like following an old treasure map with the important paths torn away.‚Äù ‚Äî Heather Gudenkauf

  • ‚ÄúA daughter is God‚Äôs way of saying, ‚ÄòThought you could use a lifelong friend.‚Äô‚Äù ‚Äî Unknown

  • ‚ÄúGrace was in all her steps. Heaven in her eye. In every gesture, dignity and love.‚Äù ‚Äî John Milton

  • ‚ÄúImperfections are beauty, madness is genius, and it‚Äôs better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.‚Äù ‚Äî Marilyn Monroe

  • ‚ÄúA daughter is one of the most beautiful gifts this world has to give.‚Äù ‚Äî Laurel Atherton

  • ‚ÄúShe makes the day brighter. She leaves a little sparkle wherever she goes.‚Äù ‚Äî Kate Spade

  • ‚ÄúA daughter is a bundle of firsts that excite and delight, giggles that come from deep inside and are always contagious, everything wonderful and precious and your love for her knows no bounds.‚Äù ‚Äî Barbara Cage

  • ‚ÄúWhen we asked for a daughter, we were sent a princess.‚Äù ‚Äî Sally Huss

  • ‚ÄúI thought I‚Äôd never be that annoying person, but as soon as my daughter was born, I was showing iPhone snaps to a cab driver.‚Äù ‚Äî Jimmy Fallon

  • ‚ÄúLittle girls, like butterflies, need no excuse.‚Äù ‚Äî Robert A. Heinlein

  • ‚ÄúLittle girls are the nicest things that happen to people. They are born with a little bit of angel shine about them, and though it wears thin sometimes there is always enough left to lasso your heart.‚Äù ‚Äî Alan Beck

  • ‚ÄúYou are my sun, my moon, and all of my stars.‚Äù ‚Äî E.E. Cummings

  • ‚ÄúSometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.‚Äù ‚Äî Winnie the Pooh

  • ‚ÄúMy daughter is my biggest achievement. She is a little star and my life has changed so much for the better since she came along.‚Äù ‚Äî Denise Van Outen

  • ‚ÄúFind it within you to love exactly who you are and to know you‚Äôre capable, you‚Äôre loved and you‚Äôre beautiful. The world is a better place, because of you. You are unique because there is only ONE of you.‚Äù ‚Äî Shantel VanSanten

  • ‚ÄúOur daughters are the most precious of our treasures, the dearest possessions of our homes and the objects of our most watchful love.‚Äù ‚Äî Margaret E. Sangster

  • ‚ÄúI keep seeing myself in my daughter, and I see my mother in me and in her.‚Äù ‚Äî Julie Walters

  • ‚ÄúHaving a little girl has been like following an old treasure map with the important paths torn away.‚Äù ‚Äî Heather Gudenkauf

Inspirational Quotes about Daughters

  • ‚ÄúWe gotta start teaching our daughters to be somebodies instead of somebody‚Äôs.‚Äù ‚Äî **Kifah Shah

  • ‚ÄúA girl should be two things: who and what she wants.‚Äù ‚Äî Coco Chanel

  • ‚ÄúMothers and daughters together are a powerful force to be reckoned with.‚Äù ‚Äî Melia Keeton-Digby

  • ‚ÄúNever play the princess when you can be the queen: rule the kingdom, swing a scepter, wear a crown of gold.‚Äù ‚Äî Sarah McCane

  • ‚ÄúWhat I wanted most for my daughter was that she be able to soar confidently in her own sky, whatever that may be.‚Äù ‚Äî Helen Claes

  • ‚ÄúLife is tough, my darling, but so are you.‚Äù ‚Äî Stephanie Bennet Henry

  • ‚ÄúWords can be worrisome, people complex, motives and manners unclear, grant her the wisdom to choose her path right, free from unkindness and fear.‚Äù ‚Äî Neil Gaiman

  • ‚ÄúAnd one day she discovered that she was fierce, and strong, and full of fire, and that not even she could hold herself back because her passion burned brighter than her fears.‚Äù ‚Äî Mark Anthony

  • ‚ÄúWe need women who are so strong they can be gentle, so educated they can be humble, so fierce they can be compassionate, so passionate they can be rational, and so disciplined they can be free.‚Äù ‚Äî Kavita Ramdas

  • ‚ÄúCourage, sacrifice, determination, commitment, toughness, heart, talent, guts. That‚Äôs what little girls are made of; the heck with sugar and spice.‚Äù ‚Äî Bethany Hamilton

  • ‚ÄúNever grow a wishbone, daughter, where a backbone ought to be.‚Äù ‚Äî Clementine Paddleford

  • ‚ÄúAngry mothers raise daughters fierce enough to fight wolves.‚Äù‚Äï Nghi Vo

scraped_articles.title: Adversity Quotes: Powerful Phrases to Help You Stay Strong During Tough Times
scraped_articles.meta_description: These quotes remind us that resilience is within us and waiting to be awakened.
scraped_articles.content:
Adversity Quotes: Powerful Phrases to Help You Stay Strong During Tough Times

These quotes remind us that resilience is within us and waiting to be awakened. (Photo by Vika Glitter on Pexels)

Adversity Quotes: Powerful Phrases to Help You Stay Strong During Tough Times

In tough times, finding strength can be overwhelming. However, amidst the storms of life, there are words of wisdom that can be a source of hope.

Adversity quotes offer solace and inspiration.

These quotes remind us that resilience is within us and waiting to be awakened.

These powerful phrases serve as reminders of our inner strength and capability to overcome even the darkest of moments.

In this article, we explore a collection of adversity quotes. It aims to give you the motivation and courage needed to face life's challenges with grace and determination.

Check out these adversity quotes and choose one to help you stay strong during your tough times. Don‚Äôt miss out!

A. Adversity Quotes to Help You Stay Strong

1.¬†‚ÄúThe greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.‚Äù ‚Äî Moli√®re

2. ‚ÄúIf the road is easy, you‚Äôre likely going the wrong way.‚Äù ‚Äï Terry Goodkind

3. ‚ÄúOur greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.‚Äù ‚Äî Confucius

4. ‚ÄúNever lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.‚Äù ‚Äï Roy T. Bennett

5.¬†‚ÄúObstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.‚Äù ‚Äî Henry Ford

6.¬†‚ÄúDifficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.‚Äù ‚Äî Seneca

7. ‚ÄúOut of difficulties grow miracles.‚Äù ‚Äî Jean de La Bruy√®re

8. ‚ÄúStrength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.‚Äù ‚Äî Arnold Schwarzenegger

9. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôll never find a better sparring partner than adversity.‚Äù ‚Äî Golda Meir

10.¬†‚ÄúWhen adversity strikes, that‚Äôs when you have to be the most calm. Take a step back, stay strong, stay grounded and press on.‚Äù ‚Äî LL Cool J

B. Adversity Quotes to Overcome It

1. ‚ÄúObstacles don‚Äôt have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don‚Äôt turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.‚Äù ‚Äî Michael Jordan

2. ‚ÄúWe are survivors with an inherent strength within us. Never again shall we be weak or helpless.‚Äù ‚Äî Jewel

3. ‚ÄúStrength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.‚Äù ‚Äî Mahatma Gandhi

4. ‚ÄúHard times may have held you down, but they will not last forever. When all is said and done, you will be increased.‚Äù ‚Äî Dalai Lama

5.¬†‚ÄúHard times may have held you down, but they will not last forever. When all is said and done, you will be increased.‚Äù ‚Äî Joel Osteen

6.¬†‚ÄúThe only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.‚Äù ‚Äî Joel Brown ‚Äú

7. ‚ÄúBelieve in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.‚Äù ‚Äî Christian D. Larson

8.¬†‚ÄúAs we navigate through life, we don‚Äôt become stronger because circumstances get easier or more forgiving. Rather, our own inner strength grows.‚Äù ‚Äî Steve Maraboli.

9. The oak fought the wind and was broken; the willow bent when it must and survived.‚Äù ‚Äî Robert Jordan

10.¬†‚ÄúYou are stronger than you think. You are more capable than you ever dreamed. You are loved more than you can possibly imagine.‚Äù ‚Äî Ritu Ghatourey

C. Adversity Quotes About Embracing Challenges

1. ‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to create it.‚Äù ‚Äî Peter Drucker

2. ‚ÄúIn the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.‚Äù ‚Äî Albert Camus

3. ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.‚Äù ‚Äî Jimmy Dean

4.¬†‚ÄúAdversity introduces a man to himself.‚Äù ‚Äî Albert Einstein

5.¬†‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.‚Äù ‚Äî Oprah Winfrey

6.¬†‚ÄúThese are the times that try men‚Äôs souls.‚Äù ‚Äî Thomas Paine

7. ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.‚Äù ‚Äî Barbara De Angelis

8. ‚ÄúOur very survival depends on our ability to stay awake, to adjust to new ideas, to remain vigilant and to face the challenge of change.‚Äù ‚Äî Martin Luther King Jr.

9. ‚ÄúWhen one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.‚Äù ‚Äî Helen Keller

10.¬†‚ÄúNothing in the world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain, difficulty‚Ä¶ I have never in my life envied a human being who led an easy life. I have envied a great many people who led difficult lives and led them well.‚Äù ‚Äï Theodore Roosevelt

scraped_articles.title: 32 Focus on Yourself Quotes to Help You Stay on Track
scraped_articles.meta_description: Explore these quotes that will remind you to prioritize your own well-being and dreams.
scraped_articles.content:
32 Focus on Yourself Quotes to Help You Stay on Track

Explore these quotes that will remind you to prioritize your own well-being and dreams.

32 Focus on Yourself Quotes to Help You Stay on Track

Have you ever been so busy looking at others that you forget to pay attention to yourself?

Or maybe you're too busy comparing your life with others?

Well, it happens to all of us sometimes.

That's why we need to read focus on yourself quotes to keep us on track.

Whether you're facing challenges or chasing dreams, finding inspiration can make all the difference.

It's also important to take a step back and focus on yourself.

Luckily, we've compiled a list of focus on yourself quotes for you.

Let's explore these focus on yourself quotes that will remind you to prioritize your own well-being and dreams.

Focus on Yourself Quotes to Keep You on Track

1. ‚ÄúFocus on yourself ‚Äî do what you want, when you want, without having to consider anyone else‚Äôs agenda.‚Äù ‚Äì Lauren Weisberger

2. ‚ÄúStay focused on your goals, your peace, and your happiness. Don‚Äôt waste your time on anything that doesn‚Äôt contribute to your growth.‚Äù ‚Äì Unknown

3. ‚ÄúIf you want to succeed focus on changing yourself, not others.‚Äù ‚Äì Unknown

4. ‚ÄúYou have to focus on yourself, feel as good as you can, and make your relationship with yourself a priority. When you do that, everything else will fall into place.‚Äù ‚Äì Elizabeth Daniels

5. "Life isn‚Äôt about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.‚Äù ‚Äì George Bernard Shaw

6. ‚ÄúI heard you were focusing a little more on yourself, and worrying a little less about everyone else. That‚Äôs beautiful.‚Äù ‚Äì Unknown

7. ‚ÄúThe more you are like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.‚Äù ‚Äì Walt Disney

8. ‚ÄúLet the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.‚Äù ‚Äì Roy T. Bennett

9. ‚ÄúThe best thing I ever did was become more low-key and focus on myself.‚Äù ‚Äì Unknown

10. ‚ÄúBe the change that you wish to see in the world.‚Äù ‚Äì Mahatma Gandhi

11. ‚ÄúThe only one you should compare yourself to is you. Your mission is to become better today than you were yesterday. You do that by focusing on what you can do today to improve and grow.‚Äù ‚Äì John Maxwell

12. ‚ÄúBe a witness, not a judge. Focus on yourself, not on others. Listen to your heart, not to the crowd.‚Äù ‚Äì Unknown

13. ‚ÄúRespect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt, that‚Äôs real power.‚Äù ‚Äì Clint Eastwood

14. "Beginning today, set an intention and a relentless focus on living your life as the greatest person you can be, in all situations.‚Äù ‚Äì Brendon Burchard

15. ‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt matter what others think. This is about YOU. Create a life that you genuinely love with your whole heart and start with yourself.‚Äù ‚Äì Brittany Burgunder

16. ‚ÄúAsk yourself if what you‚Äôre doing today is getting you closer to where you want to be tomorrow.‚Äù ‚Äì Unknown

17. ‚ÄúOften we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.‚Äù ‚Äì Helen Keller

18. ‚ÄúUntil you value yourself, you won‚Äôt value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.‚Äù ‚Äì M. Scott Peck

19. "When you focus on yourself and love yourself more, some relationships have to go.‚Äù ‚Äì Adrian Michael

20. ‚ÄúJust look at yourself in the mirror and focus on what you need to do to get better.‚Äù ‚Äì Choo Freeman

21. "Focus on yourself and not the world. Fight the battles inside you first and then watch the world change around you.‚Äù ‚Äì C.R. Elliott

22. ‚ÄúWhatever you are, be a good one.‚Äù ‚Äì Abraham Lincoln

23. ‚ÄúIf my life is going to mean anything, I have to live it myself.‚Äù ‚Äì Rick Riordan

24. ‚ÄúIf you don‚Äôt separate yourself from your distractions, your distractions will separate you from your goals.‚Äù ‚Äì Unknown

25.¬† ‚ÄúYou have your own life, why waste it focusing on others.‚Äù ‚Äì Nitin Namdeo

26. ‚ÄúI am the only person in the world I should like to know thoroughly.‚Äù ‚Äì Oscar Wilde

27. ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt let the noise of other‚Äôs opinions drown out your inner voice.‚Äù ‚Äì Steve Jobs

28. ‚ÄúIn the journey of finding love I focus on having a great relationship with myself first.‚Äù ‚Äì Angel Moreira

29. ‚ÄúTalk to yourself like you would someone you love.‚Äù ‚Äì Brene Brown

30. ‚ÄúAlways remember, your focus determines your reality.‚Äù ‚Äì George Lucas

31. ‚ÄúFocus on whatever enhances your growth. Stop focusing on distractions that will take you away from your purpose.‚Äù ‚Äì Unknown

32. ‚ÄúIf it doesn‚Äôt make you happy anymore, then it‚Äôs time to let it go and focus on yourself.‚Äù ‚Äì Unknown

scraped_articles.meta_keywords: The Scariest Female Ghosts in the World
scraped_articles.content:
The Scariest Female Ghosts in the World

The Scariest Female Ghosts in the World

Ghosts scare people everywhere. Some of the scariest ones are female. Let's learn about a few from different countries.

Swipe Up if You Dare!

Kuntilanak (Indonesia)

Also known as 'Pontianak', this lady ghost has a very scary look. She usually appears in white long cloth and hair, with a very scary face as well. She hangs around banana trees and harms people who see her.

Kuchisake-Onna (Japan)

She has a scary face. She asks if she's pretty, no matter what you say, she shows her scary smile and chases you with a knife!

Manananggal (Philippines)

This female creature can split in two. The upper part flies to hurt pregnant women and their babies.

La Llorona (Mexico)

She cries for her lost kids and wants to take others who look like them.

Madam Koi Koi (Nigeria)

She wears bloody red high heels and makes spooky sounds at night, causing sleepless nights.

Bloody Mary (England)

She appears in a mirror when you say her name three times. She looks scary with blood all over her face.

The Dancing Lady (Serbia)

She is often seen under the streetlight, doing strange dances. When she knows there's someone that saw her, she will chase after them with a knife and hurt them!

scraped_articles.title: Top 8 Most Beautiful Places in Scotland You Shouldn't Missed Out On
scraped_articles.meta_description: From the charming city of Edinburgh to the wilderness of Rannoch Moor, here are the most beautiful places in Scotland you shouldn't miss out on.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: most beautiful places in Scotland,places to visit in Scotland
scraped_articles.content:
Top 8 Most Beautiful Places in Scotland You Shouldn't Missed Out On

Top 8 Most Beautiful Places in Scotland You Shouldn't Missed Out On

Scotland is a country known for its stunning landscapes, rich history, and vibrant culture.

From the bustling streets of Edinburgh to the serene beauty of Loch Lomond, there are countless places to explore.

¬© 2024 trstdly.com

Here are some of the most beautiful places in Scotland that you shouldn't miss:

1. Edinburgh

Edinburgh is the capital city of Scotland and is famous for its medieval Old Town.

This historic area is filled with narrow streets, hidden pubs, and historical landmarks like Edinburgh Castle and Holyrood Palace.¬† The city's unique blend of old and new makes it a must-visit destination.

2. Isle of Skye

The Isle of Skye is a picturesque island off the west coast of Scotland. It is known for its rugged landscapes, towering mountains, and beautiful beaches.

The island is home to many famous landmarks like the Old Man of Storr and the Quiraing. Skye is a perfect place for nature lovers and those who enjoy scenic drives.

3. Glen Coe

Glen Coe is a valley in the Scottish Highlands that is famous for its dramatic scenery.

The valley is surrounded by towering mountains and has a rich history, including the infamous Massacre of Glencoe. Visitors can enjoy hiking, skiing, and taking in the breathtaking views.

4. Orkney

Orkney is an archipelago off the north coast of Scotland. It is known for its ancient history, including the Neolithic sites of Skara Brae and Maeshowe. The islands are also home to many beautiful beaches and wildlife, including puffins and seals.

5. Loch Lomond

Loch Lomond is the largest freshwater lake in Scotland and is surrounded by stunning scenery. Visitors can enjoy boat rides, hiking, and exploring the nearby Trossachs National Park. The loch is also home to many species of fish and birds.

6. Rannoch Moor

Rannoch Moor is one of the last remaining wildernesses in Europe. It is a vast area of heather-covered moorland, peat bogs, and lochs. Visitors can enjoy hiking, birdwatching, and taking in the peaceful atmosphere of this natural wonder.

7. Ben Nevis

Ben Nevis is the highest mountain in the British Isles and is located in the Scottish Highlands. It is a popular destination for hikers and offers breathtaking views from the summit. Visitors can also explore the nearby Glen Nevis valley.

8. Loch Alsh

Loch Alsh is a beautiful freshwater loch located in the Scottish Highlands. It is known for its crystal-clear waters and picturesque surroundings. Visitors can enjoy boat rides, fishing, and exploring the nearby Eilean Donan Castle.

scraped_articles.meta_description: Dior reportedly replaced Bella Hadid with May Tager.
scraped_articles.content:
May Tager Become New DIOR's Model, Here are Her Portraits

Dior reportedly replaced Bella Hadid with May Tager.

May Tager Become New DIOR's Model, Here are Her Portraits

The fashion house has replaced Palestinian-American supermodel Bella Hadid with Israeli model May Tager in their latest ad campaign.

According to WIO News, Dior has chosen Israeli model May Tager to front their campaign. Previously, this role was held by Bella Hadid, who has long been a supporter of the Palestinian cause and a vocal critic of Israel.

According to Ynet News, May Tager is a model who has worked with many international brands, including Giorgio Armani, Louis Vuitton, and Victoria's Secret.

She started her career as a model when she was 15 years old.

May Tager revealed that she grew up in Ganei Tikva, Israel, where her parents moved from Denmark.

May Tager's international career began a month after she debuted as a model at 16 year-old.

She admitted that her genuine interest was in acting. Her parents were also not big fans of modeling.

After one year as a model, May Tager shot for Estee Lauder as her biggest campaign.

scraped_articles.title: The Super Mario Bros Movie Cast Members We'll Never Forget

scraped_articles.content:
The Super Mario Bros Movie Cast Members We'll Never Forget

The Super Mario Bros Movie Cast Members We'll Never Forget

As the figures for "The Super Mario Bros Movie," fans are eager to see beloved characters from the iconic video game franchise come to life on the big screen.

The star-studded cast brings a mix of talent, humor, and charisma to each character. The Super Mario Bros Movie cast creates a cinematic experience. These characters promise to be unforgettable. Let's dive into the cast members we'll never forget in this timeless adventure through the Mushroom Kingdom.

The Super Mario Bros Movie

1. Chris Pratt as Mario

Chris Pratt takes on the role of the charismatic and mustachioed plumber, Mario.¬†He is known for his breakout performance as Andy Dwyer in "Parks and Recreation" and his voice work in animated hits like "The Lego Movie" and "Onward."

Pratt's portrayal of Mario is highly expected. His ability to infuse humor and warmth into characters makes him the perfect fit for the iconic hero on a mission to save his younger brother, Luigi.

2. Charlie Day as Luigi

Charlie Day as Luigi, Mario's shy yet adorable younger brother.¬†Known for his hilarious antics as Charlie Kelly on "It‚Äôs Always Sunny in Philadelphia."

Day brings a unique blend of humor and charm to Luigi's character. With his vast experience in both television and film, Day is set to deliver a Luigi we won't soon forget.

3. Anya Taylor-Joy as Princess Peach

Anya Taylor-Joy graces the voice as the regal Princess Peach, Mario's guide and love interest. With a beautiful presence in films like "The Witch," "Split," and her award-winning role in "The Queen‚Äôs Gambit."

Taylor-Joy's portrayal promises to add depth and complexity to the beloved princess character. Her talent for expressing emotion and strength will surely leave a lasting impression.

4. Keegan-Michael Key as Toad

Keegan-Michael Key brings his comedic prowess to the role of Toad. Toad is a red-spotted toad who traveled in The Super Mario Bros Movie.

Michael is known for his work on "Key & Peele" and various film projects. Key's animated performances have delighted audiences in films like "The Lego Movie" and "Storks." With his infectious energy, Toad will become a standout character in the Mushroom Kingdom.

Jack Black is a versatile actor and comedian. He takes on the formidable role of Bowser, the King of the Koopas. With a diverse filmography that includes animated hits like the "Kung Fu Panda" franchise.¬†

5. Jack Black as Bowser

Black is famous for his voice and memorable characters. His unique blend of humor and charisma will bring an entertaining and unforgettable dimension to the iconic antagonist.

"The Super Mario Bros Movie" promises to be a delightful journey for longtime fans of the video game series and newcomers to the Mushroom Kingdom.¬†

The talented cast, led by Chris Pratt, Charlie Day, Anya Taylor-Joy, Keegan-Michael Key, and Jack Black, ensures these characters will be etched in our memories.¬†

The Super Mario Bros Movie

Audiences can look forward to a cinematic adventure filled with humor, heart, and the lasting spirit of the iconic Super Mario universe.

scraped_articles.title: 5 Haunted Places In and Near Brisbane for Those Seeking Ghostly Thrills
scraped_articles.meta_description: These locations offer a chance to experience the ghostly side of Brisbane.

scraped_articles.content:
5 Haunted Places In and Near Brisbane for Those Seeking Ghostly Thrills

5 Haunted Places In and Near Brisbane for Those Seeking Ghostly Thrills

Take a spooky journey as we discover the mysteries of haunted places in and near Brisbane. Brisbane has some creepy tales and ghostly legends if you're up for a thrilling encounter with the supernatural. It ranges from historic sites with spirits to mysterious spots that'll give you goosebumps. We've got five enchanting places to explore in Brisbane. Join us on this ghostly adventure where the past and the paranormal combine. These haunted places in Brisbane give us into the line between the living and the spectral is thin. Prepare for a haunting experience in Brisbane that sparks curiosity for those attracted to the unknown.

1. Mount Gravatt-Capalaba Road

This stretch of road has gained a reputation for being haunted by a ghostly figure known as the "Fallowbrook Phantom."

According to local legends, sightings of a ghostly figure dressed in 1800s dress.

It has been reported, with some claiming it disappeared into thin air. If you're up for a spooky adventure, drive alertly along this haunted road, especially at night!

Haunted Places In and Near Brisbane

flickr/Aussie~mobs

2. Toowong Cemetery

As one of Brisbane's oldest cemeteries, Toowong Cemetery is a magnet for ghost fans. This spooky location is rumored to be haunted by restless spirits. This feature makes it a perfect spot for ghostly thrills.

Many visitors have reported unexplained sightings and strange happenings, including unexplained cold spots and eerie whispers. Take a guided tour or explore the cemetery during the day for a mysterious experience.

3. Boggo Road Gaol

Boggo Road Gaol is known as one of Australia's most notorious prisons.¬†It has a dark and haunted past.

Ex-prisoners and prison staff have shared numerous tales of ghostly encounters.

Visitors have reported hearing unexplained footsteps, disembodied voices, and sudden temperature drops. Join a guided ghost tour to learn about the history of this haunted prison. You may experience a spine-chilling atmosphere.

Haunted Places In and Near Brisbane

4. Schonell Theatre, UQ, St Lucia

This historic theater is on the University of Queensland campus. It has its fair share of paranormal stories.

Built in the 1970s, it is said to be haunted by the spirit of a former projectionist.

Staff and visitors have reported hearing mysterious footsteps and strange knocking sounds‚Äîsome also sightings of a shadowy figure in the projection room. Watch out for any paranormal activity if you visit this iconic theater.

Haunted Places In and Near Brisbane

5. The Australian Hotel, Boonah

The Australian Hotel has a long history and a haunting reputation. It is located in the charming town of Boonah. Numerous ghostly encounters have been reported, including sightings of a woman in a Victorian-era dress. Some also hear strange sounds in empty rooms. This historic hotel offers accommodation for those brave enough to spend a night surrounded by paranormal activity. If you're feeling adventurous, join a ghost tour to discover the hotel's mysterious secrets.

Brisbane and its surrounding areas are home to several haunted places. These experiences will send shivers down your spine.

Whether you're a thrill-seeker or delighted by the supernatural, these locations offer a chance to experience the ghostly side of Brisbane.

Just remember to visit these haunted sites with respect for the unknown. Who knows what paranormal encounters await you in Brisbane's haunted past?

Haunted Places In and Near Brisbane

scraped_articles.title: Chris Espinosa Becomes Apple's Longest-Serving Employee Who Joined at Age 14
scraped_articles.meta_description: Started his career at 14 while still in high school.
scraped_articles.content:
Chris Espinosa Becomes Apple's Longest-Serving Employee Who Joined at Age 14

Chris Espinosa Becomes Apple's Longest-Serving Employee Who Joined at Age 14

Chris Espinosa, Apple's longest-serving employee, started his career at 14 while still in high school.

Espinosa's journey with Apple began in 1976 when he met Steve Jobs at Paul Terrell's Byte Shop while Jobs installed an Apple I.

Despite warnings from his teachers at Homestead High School, where Jobs and Steve Wozniak also studied, Espinosa befriended Wozniak and became a regular attendee of the Homebrew Computer Club.

He later became Apple employee number 8 while still in high school, working on programs and public demos for the Apple II.

Espinosa began his junior year at the University of California, Berkeley in 1978, where he met Andy Hertzfeld and rewrote the Apple II user guide under the direction of Jef Raskin, Apple's publications manager.

He returned to Apple full-time as director of documentation for the Macintosh project, hiring a team to write technical documentation and user guides.

After the Macintosh project, Espinosa worked in Apple's Marketing division and on the Kalieda project.

Currently, he manages the Components and Scripts department and contributes to the development of Apple's Xcode developer tools.

He officially started working at Apple on St. Patrick's Day in 1977, although he had been working part-time for several months. He was present when Apple was founded in January 1977.

His initial job was to test the Apple II BASIC operating system, and he even broke into Steve Jobs' office for various reasons.

When Steve Jobs left Apple in 1985 to found NeXT, Espinosa became a senior employee. After Jobs returned in 1997, Espinosa's employment status was rolled back to reflect his continued service.

During his more than 45-year career, Espinosa has witnessed Apple's evolution from the hand-crafted Apple I to cutting-edge products like the iPhone and iPad.

His dedication and contributions have solidified his position as an important figure in Apple's history.

scraped_articles.title: Top 10 Most Beautiful Places in Oregon That Will Leave You in Awe
scraped_articles.meta_description: These most beautiful places in Oregon will make you speechless and turin your trip into a memorable experience.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: most beautiful places in Oregon,Places to Visit in Oregon
scraped_articles.content:
Top 10 Most Beautiful Places in Oregon That Will Leave You in Awe

Top 10 Most Beautiful Places in Oregon That Will Leave You in Awe

Oregon is a state in the Pacific Northwest of the United States.

Known as the Beaver State, it's famous among outdoor enthusiasts for its unparalleled beauty. From the towering mountains to the enchanting Japanese garden, there are many places in Oregon that will take your breath away.

If you are going to visit Oregon for the first time, here are the ten most beautiful places in Oregon that will leave you in awe. These places will turn your trip into a memorable experience.

1. Crater Lake

Crater Lake is the deepest lake in the United States. It is known for its bright blue water and stunning views. The lake was formed by a volcanic eruption, and you can see the tall cliffs around it. In summer, you can take a boat tour of the lake or hike around the rim for great views.

2. Wallowa Mountains

The Wallowa Mountains are located in the northeastern part of Oregon. They are sometimes called the "Alps of Oregon" because of their high peaks and beautiful landscapes.

You can go hiking, camping, or horseback riding in this area. The scenery is amazing, with colorful wildflowers and clear rivers.

Multnomah Falls is one of the most famous waterfalls in the United States. It is about 620 feet tall and has two drops.

3. Multnomah Falls

There is a bridge called the Benson Bridge where you can take photos of the falls.¬† The area around the falls has lovely hiking trails and views of the Columbia River Gorge.

4. Smith Rock State Park

Smith Rock State Park is known for its unique rock formations. It is a popular spot for rock climbing and hiking. The Crooked River flows through the park, adding to its beauty. You can explore many trails and see stunning views of the mountains and the rocks.

5. Ramona Falls

Ramona Falls is a beautiful waterfall near Mount Hood. The water cascades down rocks and creates a misty environment. To see the falls, you have to hike a trail that leads through a lovely forest. It is peaceful and a great place to relax and enjoy nature.

6. Mt. Hood National Forest

Mt. Hood is the tallest mountain in Oregon. The national forest around it is full of lush trees and wildlife. You can hike or drive through the forest and see beautiful views of the mountain. There are many lakes and rivers where you can picnic, fish, or go camping.

7. Cannon Beach

Cannon Beach is a famous beach on the Oregon coast. It is known for its long sandy shores and the iconic Haystack Rock.

The beach is great for walking, playing in the sand, or watching the sunset. Many shops and restaurants are nearby, making it a fun place to spend the day.

8. Silver Falls State Park

Silver Falls State Park is famous for its waterfalls. The park has a trail that takes you behind some of the falls, so you can see them up close. The area is full of tall trees and beautiful scenery. It's a perfect place for hiking and enjoying a picnic with family and friends.

9. Portland Japanese Garden

The Portland Japanese Garden is in the city of Portland. It is a peaceful place with beautiful gardens, ponds, and bridges. You can see many types of plants and flowers.¬†

The garden is designed to create a calm and relaxing atmosphere, making it a perfect spot to escape the city.

10. Alvord Desert

The Alvord Desert is a unique and beautiful place in southeastern Oregon. It is a dry lake bed with wide-open spaces and stunning landscapes.¬†

The desert is a great place to see the stars at night because there is little light pollution. You can hike or drive through the desert and enjoy the beauty of the peaceful surroundings.

scraped_articles.title: 45 Progress Quotes to Motivate You to Keep Going On
scraped_articles.meta_description: Reading these powerful progress quotes will give us a fresh energy to keep moving forward when we feel down.
scraped_articles.content:
45 Progress Quotes to Motivate You to Keep Going On

Progress is important for everyone. People want to grow at work, school, or in their personal life. Sometimes, progress feels very slow or hard to notice. When progress is difficult, it can make people feel stuck or lose hope. Many people use progress quotes to find motivation and keep moving forward.

Challenges can make anyone feel tired or ready to give up. Progress quotes remind people that small steps are valuable. Every little effort helps, even if the change is not big right away. These powerful progress quotes give new energy and a fresh way to look at the journey.

In this article, we have collected some of the best progress quotes from various sources, Thursday (17/4/2025). These powerful words will inspire you to keep going and reach your goals. Read these quotes to help you stay positive and focused at any time.

Short and Powerful Progress Quotes

1. "If there is no struggle, there is no progress." - Frederick Douglass

2. "Progress is the activity of today and the assurance of tomorrow." - Ralph Waldo Emerson

3. "Lack of emotion causes lack of progress and lack of motivation." - Tony Robbins

4. "Conceit is an insuperable obstacle to all progress." - Ellen Terry

5. "You cannot make progress without making decisions." - Jim Rohn

6. "True progress quietly and persistently moves along without notice." - Saint Francis de Sales

7. "It's not about success, it's about progress." - Tony Robbins

8. "All progress is experimental." - John Jay Chapman

9. "Discontent is the first step in the progress of a man or a nation." - Oscar Wilde

10. "Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible." - Frank Zappa

11. "I am a slow walker, but I never walk back." - Abraham Lincoln

12. "There is no progress or accomplishment without sacrifice." - Idowu Koyenikan

13. "We can't become what we need to be by remaining what we are." - Oprah Winfrey

14. "Progress takes time and discipline." - Ronnie Coleman

15. "The world hates change, yet it is the only thing that has brought progress." - Charles Kettering

Inspirational Progress Quotes

1. "If necessity is the mother of invention, discontent is the father of progress." - David Rockefeller

2. "A person with half volition goes backwards and forwards, but makes no progress on even the smoothest of roads." - Thomas Carlyle

3. "Fundamental progress has to do with the reinterpretation of basic ideas." - Alfred North Whitehead

4. "Progress lies not in enhancing what is, but in advancing toward what will be." - Khalil Gibran

5. "Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning." - Benjamin Franklin

6. "Human progress is neither automatic nor inevitable... Every step toward the goal of justice requires sacrifice, suffering, and struggle; the tireless exertions and passionate concern of dedicated individuals." - Martin Luther King, Jr.

7. "He who rejects change is the architect of decay. The only human institution which rejects progress is the cemetery." - Harold Wilson

8. "Plan your progress carefully; hour-by hour, day-by-day, month-by-month. Organized activity and maintained enthusiasm are the wellsprings of your power." - Paul J. Meyer

9. "Change does not necessarily assure progress, but progress implacably requires change. Education is essential to change, for education creates both new wants and the ability to satisfy them." - Henry Steele Commager

10. "The reasonable man adapts himself to the world: the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man." - George Bernard Shaw

11. "Progress isn't made by early risers. It's made by lazy men trying to find easier ways to do something." - Robert Heinlein

12. "Progress means getting nearer to the place you want to be. And if you have taken a wrong turn, then to go forward does not get you any nearer. If you are on the wrong road, progress means doing an about-turn and walking back to the right road; and in that case the man who turns back soonest is the most progressive man." - C.S. Lewis

13. "Changes and progress very rarely are gifts from above. They come out of struggles from below." - Noam Chomsky

14. "Restlessness is discontent and discontent is the first necessity of progress. Show me a thoroughly satisfied man and I will show you a failure." - Thomas A. Edison

15. "Do not confuse motion and progress. A rocking horse keeps moving but does not make any progress." - Alfred A. Montapert

Motivational Progress Quotes

1. "Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything." - George Bernard Shaw

2. "If you're walking down the right path and you're willing to keep walking, eventually you'll make progress." - Barack Obama

3. "Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success." - Henry Ford

4. "Greatness is a lot of small things done well. Day after day, workout after workout, obedience after obedience, day after day." - Ray Lewis

5. "When any real progress is made, we unlearned and learn anew what we thought we knew before." - Henry David Thoreau

6. "Every day you may make progress. Every step may be fruitful. Yet there will stretch out before you an ever-lengthening, ever-ascending, ever-improving path. You know you will never get to the end of the journey. But this, so far from discouraging, only adds to the joy and glory of the climb." - Winston S. Churchill

7. "There are many ways of going forward, but only one way of standing still." - Franklin D. Roosevelt

8. "One can choose to go back toward safety or forward toward growth. Growth must be chosen again and again; fear must be overcome again and again." - Abraham Maslow

9. "You don't make progress by standing on the sidelines, whimpering and complaining. You make progress by implementing ideas." - Shirley Chisholm

10. "Optimism is essential to achievement and it is also the foundation of courage and true progress." - Nicholas M. Butler

11. "Without struggle, no progress and no result. Every breaking of habit produces a change in the machine." - George Gurdjieff

12. "We must always set the bar high, otherwise we do not progress." - Kylian Mbappe

13. "Change is inevitable, change will always happen, but you have to apply direction to change, and that's when it's progress." - Doug Baldwin

14. "All progress occurs because people dare to be different" - Harry Milner

15. "Never discourage anyone who continually makes progress, no matter how slow." - Plato

scraped_articles.title: The Story of Astronaut Luca Parmitano Who Almost Drowned in a Spacesuit while on Duty
scraped_articles.meta_description: The Story of Astronaut Luca Parmitano Who Almost Drowned in a Spacesuit while on Duty
scraped_articles.content:
The Story of Astronaut Luca Parmitano Who Almost Drowned in a Spacesuit while on Duty

The Story of Astronaut Luca Parmitano Who Almost Drowned in a Spacesuit while on Duty

Almost drowning in space is an exciting story. This tense incident was experienced by Luca Parmitano, an Italian astronaut.

Quoted from the IFL Science page on Thursday (21/03), Luca Parmitano almost drowned while doing a space walk outside the International Space Station (ISS). At that time, Parmitano was conducting an Extravehicular Activity (EVA) that was planned to last six hours.

But while performing the activity, he noticed water accumulating inside his helmet. He then informed NASA about the situation.

However, they didn't realize how serious the incident was for a while. For 23 minutes, he remained outside the ISS while the liquid continued growing and flowing inside his helmet.

However, getting back to the ISS took work. He had to adjust his position by turning his body upside down.

The water covered Parmitano's nose, and his attempts to move the water by shaking his head were futile. The tense minutes were even more intense when the water covered the sponge on his earphones.

In fact, the water also almost completely covered the front of the glasses he was using. The water blocking his vision left Parmitano confused and without a direction to return to the ISS airlock.

Parmitano's journey to return to the ISS also encountered obstacles. He had to position his body with the water in his helmet. In fact, the water covering his eyes blocked his vision. When he tried to move the water by shaking his head, it only worsened things.

Parmitano became confused and didn't know which direction would take him back to the safety of the airlock. The condition lasted long when his vision could not see the handrail outside the space station used to move on EVAs.

Then, the radio became very quiet as Parmitano couldn't hear his colleagues. At that moment, he realized he was alone, could not see, and could not hear in a vacuum.

However, it didn't make him panic. Parmitano dealt with it very calmly.

He started groping along the cable to the airlock. Then he found a handle while wondering what to do if the water reached his mouth.

A moment later, he finally returned to the airlock, eyes closed. He also had not heard any instructions from NASA since he was told to ignore all the usual protocols and re-enter the ISS.

Finally, he felt the presence of his partner, Chris Cassidy, who entered the airlock and closed the door. Cassidy took a firm hold of Parmitano's gloves to reassure him that it was safe to remove his helmet.

As he was pulled out by the waiting team, he realized the tense conditions and passed safely. An investigation later revealed that contamination had clogged the filter in Parmitano's spacesuit. This led to a buildup of fluid.

Luca Parmitano's incident was not the last. There was a shocking incident during the second stage of the ISS spacewalk.

Terry Virts' uniform helmet leaked. Quoted from the Space page on Thursday (03/21). Virts, from the United States space agency NASA, experienced a leak in his uniform helmet, which resulted in chemical water getting inside.

It sounded pretty stressful, but NASA confirmed that Virts was not in danger. Virts and Barry "Butch" Wilmore were on their second spacewalk in 2015.

Virts said that the water also came from inside his spacesuit. Later, he reported that about 15 milliliters of water were removed from his helmet via a syringe.

Navias also emphasized that Virts was safe, as the water leak was mild, not excessive. Wilmore and Virts are successful in their second spacewalk to organize cables outside the ISS, which is being prepared to dock Boeing Co and Space Exploration Technologies, or SpaceX, spacecraft as a space taxi.

Both will soon undergo their last spacewalk. NASA engineers will study the water incident while reviewing plans for Wilmore and Virts' next spacewalk.

NASA itself takes water interference with space uniforms seriously. This could pose a danger to astronauts working in the vacuum of space.

scraped_articles.content:

(Photo:¬†instagram/aquamanmovie/)

10 Jason Momoa's Aquaman Diet and Workout Plan

Jason Momoa's fantastic physique as Aquaman in the DC Extended Universe. He has left fans in awe of his strength and muscle definition.

But achieving that superhero body doesn't come easy‚Äîit takes dedication, hard work, and a strict diet and workout¬†goal.¬†This article will explore¬†10¬†essential parts of Jason Momoa's Aquaman diet and workout plan that have helped him achieve his iconic look.




Jason Momoa's Aquaman Diet and Workout Plan

1. Jason Momoa's Workout Supplements:

Momoa uses various supplements to enhance his workouts and aid muscle recovery. These may include protein shakes, creatine, mass gainers, and pre-workout supplements.

Before diving into his intense workout routine, Momoa reportedly starts with 100 push-ups and 100 squats. This helps to get his blood flowing and muscles activated before hitting the weights.

scraped_articles.title: 12 Tasty French Pastries You Should Try
scraped_articles.meta_description: Do you love pastry? Here are twelve tasty French pastries that will delight your taste buds.
scraped_articles.content:
12 Tasty French Pastries You Should Try

12 Tasty French Pastries You Should Try

The Most Famous French PastriesYou Must Try

French cuisine is one of the most famous ones in the world, and they are known for their pastries. These delightful treats are not just desserts; they are a part of French culture and history. From flaky croissants to colorful macarons, French pastries offer a variety of flavors and textures that can please anyone's taste buds.

In this list, we have picked the twelve most famous French pastries you should try.

1. Croissant

The croissant is a famous French pastry, loved for its flaky, buttery layers. Perfect for breakfast, it‚Äôs made by folding dough and butter to create its unique texture. Enjoy it plain or with jam for a delicious, classic French start to your day.

2. Macarons

Macarons are colorful cookies made from almond flour, egg whites, and sugar. They have a smooth shell and are filled with cream or ganache. Macarons come in many flavors, such as chocolate, and pistachio. They are not only tasty but also beautiful to look at.

3. Pain Au Chocolat


Pain au chocolat is a flaky pastry similar to a croissant, but with rich chocolate inside. Made from buttery dough with two pieces of dark chocolate in the center, it‚Äôs perfect for chocolate lovers and makes a delicious snack anytime.

4. √âclair

An √©clair is a long pastry made from p√¢te √† choux, which is filled with pastry cream and topped with chocolate icing. The light and airy texture of the √©clair makes it a favorite among many people. Each bite offers a wonderful mix of creaminess and sweetness.

5. Chouquette

Chouquettes are small, sweet pastries made from p√¢te √† choux and sprinkled with sugar. They are light and fluffy, making them an excellent treat for any occasion. You can enjoy them as a snack or dessert.

6. Madeleine

Madeleines are small sponge cakes that have a unique shell shape. They are often flavored with lemon or vanilla and have a soft texture. These cakes are perfect for tea time or as a light dessert after dinner.

7. Mille Feuille

Mille feuille, also known as Napoleon, consists of layers of puff pastry filled with pastry cream and topped with icing. The name means "a thousand leaves," referring to its many layers. This dessert is rich and satisfying, making it a classic choice in French patisseries.

8. Profiterole

Profiteroles are small cream puffs filled with whipped cream or pastry cream and often topped with chocolate sauce. They are delightful bites that combine crispy pastry with creamy filling, making them irresistible.

9. Kouign-amann

Kouign-amann is a Breton pastry that combines layers of dough, butter, and sugar to create a sweet, caramelized treat. It has a crunchy outer layer and a soft inside, making it both unique and delicious.

10. Brioche

Brioche is a sweet bread that is soft and fluffy. It is often enjoyed for breakfast or used in desserts like bread pudding. Its rich flavor comes from the butter and eggs used in the dough.

11. Beignets

Beignets are deep-fried pastries that are light and airy inside with a crispy outside. They are often dusted with powdered sugar and can be filled with fruit or cream. Beignets make for a delightful snack or dessert.

12. Paris-Brest

Paris-Brest is a ring-shaped pastry made from p√¢te √† choux filled with praline-flavored cream. It was created to celebrate a bicycle race between Paris and Brest, France. This pastry is both delicious and has an interesting story behind it.

scraped_articles.title: "Inside Out 2" Movie Rumored to Add 4 New Emotions
scraped_articles.meta_description: Officially announced last year,
scraped_articles.content:
"Inside Out 2" Movie Rumored to Add 4 New Emotions

Officially announced last year, "Inside Out 2" is rumored will have 4 new emotions.

"Inside Out 2" Movie Rumored to Add 4 New Emotions

"Inside Out" is a 2015 animated film produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures.

The film features a unique concept where the main characters are anthropomorphic representations of Riley's emotions: Joy, Sadness, Fear, Disgust, and Anger.

Directed by Pete Docter, Inside Out is rumored to have a sequel and will have 4 new emotions.

Officially announced last year, "Inside Out 2" is rumored will have 4 new emotions.

According to inside scooper @CanWeGetToast on X, Riley the main character will have 4 new emotions during her teenage years which will be the main story of Inside Out 2.

Those number of new emotions will be Envy, Ennui, Anxiety, Embarrassment.

The cast of the first film including Joy (Amy Poehler), Sadness (Phyllis Smith), Fear (Bill Hader), Anger (Lewis Black), and Disgust (Mindy Kaling) are rumored to be returning

So far, Joy and Sadness are officially coming back, as their voice actors have been listed on IMDb for this movie.

Even so, there has been no official announcement from Pixar regarding various aspects for the sequel.

Other details of Inside Out 2 are still a secret and the only official information is that the movie will be directed by Kelsey Mann and written by Meg LeFauve.

scraped_articles.title: 6 Haunted Dolls in the World
scraped_articles.meta_description: The world of haunted dolls is where the line between reality and fiction can be blurred. Dolls have long been the basis of terror and crush. Dolls can terrorize the living.
scraped_articles.content:
6 Haunted Dolls in the World

The world of haunted dolls is where the line between reality and fiction can be blurred. Dolls have long been the basis of terror and crush. Dolls can terrorize the living. Explore their history and the legends that cover them.

6 Haunted Dolls in the World

Robert the Doll is a famous haunted doll. It was once owned by Robert Eugene Otto. He is a painter who lived in Florida.

According to legend, Robert was given the doll as a gift by a voodoo practitioner. Then it became had by an evil spirit. The doll was said to move on its own and laugh. Robert the Doll is now on display at the Fort East Martello Museum, Key West.

Annabelle

Annabelle was the subject of the hit movie ‚ÄúThe Conjuring.‚Äù The doll was given to a young girl in the 1970s. Strange and scary events started to happen. The doll was said to move on its own. The doll was said to be owned by the spirit of a dead girl. Annabelle is now kept in a glass case at the Warren Occult Museum. It is believed to be one of the most dangerous objects in the world.

Katja is a legend in the world of haunted dolls. It is said to be an antique doll. A family once owned it in Europe. According to legend, the family started to experience scary events.


It happens after they bring the doll into their home. They heard objects moving on their own. Plus, the sound of footsteps when no one was present. The family finally became scared by the doll. Strange events continued to follow. Over time, the doll became known as a haunted object.

Peggy the Doll

Peggy the Doll is a haunting doll made in the early 20th century. A young girl in England bought this doll. She soon began to experience strange and scary events. The doll was said to move on its own. Then whispered in the girl's ear. Peggy even changed her expression.

Harold, the haunted doll, is a legendary figure. It is a porcelain doll. A young girl owned it in the early 20th century. According to legend, the doll scared the girl after it seemed to come to life. Then it started to move on its own. She finally gave the doll away. It's owned by several people. Each of them reported strange and scary experiences.

Harold the Haunted Doll

Okiku is a legendary figure in Japanese folklore. It's known as a haunted doll. According to the story, Okiku was a girl who lived in the late 17th century. The story says that Okiku's ghost wants revenge for her unfair death. To calm Okiku's soul. A doll was made.

Still many frightening dolls that exist in the world. Is one of these in your house? Who knows.

scraped_articles.title: How to Create Google Form: Easy Form Building Tutorial
scraped_articles.meta_description: In this article, we share a guide on how to create Google Form and why it is important.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: How to Create Google Form,How to Make Google Form,How to Edit Google Form,Google Form
scraped_articles.content:
How to Create Google Form: Easy Form Building Tutorial

How to Create Google Form: Easy Form Building Tutorial

Creating online surveys and quizzes can be a breeze with the right tools. One such tool is Google Forms, a free and user-friendly service by Google. In this article, we will guide you through how to create Google Form to help you collect information efficiently.

Google Forms is a versatile tool that can be used for various purposes, such as gathering feedback, organizing events, or conducting polls. Its simplicity and accessibility make it popular among students, teachers, businesses, and anyone needing to collect data quickly and effectively.

Understanding how to create Google Form is essential for anyone looking to streamline their data collection process. Whether you are using a computer, phone, or tablet, Google Forms offers an easy way to create and distribute forms.

In the following sections, we will explore the different uses of Google Forms and provide step-by-step instructions on creating and customizing your own form. We made this guide on Wednesday (22/5/2024).

A. What is Google Forms?

Google Forms is a powerful tool developed by Google that allows users to create online surveys and forms. It offers a wide array of uses and benefits for individuals, businesses, and organizations.

One of the main uses of Google Forms is for conducting surveys. Whether you need to collect feedback, opinions, or gather information from a large group of people, Google Forms makes it easy to create customized surveys that can be shared and accessed online. The forms can be designed with a variety of question types such as multiple choice, short answer, and rating scales.

Another popular use of Google Forms is for event registrations. Organizers can create forms to collect RSVPs, manage attendee details, and even collect payments if needed. This simplifies the registration process and makes it convenient for both organizers and participants.

Google Forms also offers a useful feature called branching, which allows respondents to answer questions based on their previous responses. This helps in creating personalized and relevant forms, especially for quizzes or assessments.

Furthermore, Google Forms provides real-time responses and data analysis. As responses are submitted, the collected data can be visualized in the form of graphs and charts to gain insights and make informed decisions. The data can also be exported to other Google products, such as Sheets, for further analysis and collaboration.

Google Forms is a powerful tool that allows you to create online surveys and collect information easily. If you are new to using Google Forms, follow these step-by-step instructions to create a Google Form on your computer:

B. How to Make Google Form

1. Open your web browser and go to the Google Forms website: https://forms.google.com.

2. Sign in to your Google account. If you don't have one, you can create a new account for free.

3. Once you are signed in, select the "blank form" option on the top left part of the page to create a new form.

4. A new untitled form will open. Click on the "Untitled Form" field and enter a title for your form. For example, "Customer Satisfaction Survey".

5. Click on the "Untitled Question" field to enter your first question. You can choose from different types of questions, such as multiple choice, checkboxes, short answers, and more. Select the type of question you want, and enter your question and answer choices.

6. To add more questions, click on the "+ Add question" button at the bottom of the page. Repeat step 5 for each question you want to include in your form.

7. Customize your form by adding a theme, changing the background color, or adding an image. Click on the "Theme" button in the upper right corner of the page to access these options.

8. Once you have finished creating your form, click on the "Send" button in the upper right corner of the page to share it with others. You have the option to email the form, share a link, or embed it on a website.

Editing a Google Form allows you to make changes to your form's questions, settings, and design. Here's how you can edit a Google Form:

B. How to Edit Google Form

1. Accessing Your Form: Go to Google Forms and open the form you want to edit. You can do this by navigating to Google Drive, finding your form, and double-clicking on it.

2. Edit Questions: Once you have selected a form, you can start editing the questions. To edit a question, click on the question text box and modify it as needed. You can also add new questions by clicking on the "+" button below the last question.

3. Reordering Questions: If you want to change the order of your questions, click and hold the six dots icon next to the question and drag it to the desired position.

4. Customizing Settings: Click on the settings gear icon in the top right corner of the form to access form settings. Here, you can change settings such as requiring respondents to sign in, allowing multiple responses, or limiting responses to one per person.

5. Customizing Design: To customize the design of your form, click on the color palette icon at the top right corner. Here, you can change the theme, add images or videos, and adjust other design settings to personalize your form.

6. Preview and Test: Before finalizing your edits, it's important to preview and test the form. To do this, click on the "eye" icon at the top right corner of the screen. This allows you to see how the form looks and test how it functions.

7. Finish: After editing the form, you can share it with others by clicking on the "Send" button at the top right corner of the screen. You can choose to share the form via email, a URL link, or by embedding it in a website.

scraped_articles.title: School in India Has First AI Teacher

scraped_articles.content:
School in India Has First AI Teacher

School in Kerala is taking a revolutionary step in education with the introduction of AI teacher, Iris.

School in India Has First AI Teacher

A school in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, is trying something new. They hired an AI teacher named Iris.

Iris is a special type of teacher robot created by Makerlabs Edutech. This robot teacher is the first of its kind in the state.

trstdly ¬© 2024

KTCT Higher Secondary School is part of the Kaduvayil Thangal Charitable Trust.

Iris is part of a project called Atal Tinkering Lab (ATL), which was started by NITI Aayog in 2021.

People got excited when Iris was revealed last month.

Iris can answer difficult questions about a variety of subjects, speak various languages, and help students learn in a fun way.

She can even move because she has wheels.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Maker Labs (@makerlabs_official)

Makerlabs Edutech is the company behind Iris.

The company says it was excited to show it to the world. They believed Iris could change how we learn and inspire more cool discoveries in the future.

This is a significant change for education in Kerala. Iris can make learning more personal and fun for students.

scraped_articles.title: 35 Labor Day Quotes to Celebrate May Day
scraped_articles.meta_description: Let's celebrate the May Day with these inspirational Labor Day quotes.
scraped_articles.content:
35 Labor Day Quotes to Celebrate May Day

Labor Day is a special day to honor the hard work of people in many jobs. It is a time to say thank you to workers for their effort and dedication. Many countries celebrate Labor Day to show respect for workers and their important role in society. Labor Day quotes help express these feelings in a meaningful way.

In different parts of the world, Labor Day has unique meanings and dates. For example, International Labor Day is celebrated on May 1st in many countries. In the United States and Canada, Labor Day happens on the first Monday of September. Both days remind people to appreciate workers and share meaningful Labor Day quotes to honor their hard work.

In this article, we will share some inspiring Labor Day quotes to celebrate and appreciate workers and the workers movement in all around the world. We gathered these quotes and wishes from various sources, Thursday (1/5/2025).¬†

The Best Labor Day Quotes

1. "It is labour indeed that puts the difference on everything." - John Locke

2. "All labor that uplifts humanity has dignity and importance and should be undertaken with painstaking excellence." - Martin Luther King, Jr.

3. "I believe in the dignity of labor, whether with head or hand; that the world owes no man a living but that it owes every man an opportunity to make a living." - John D. Rockefeller

4. "Labor is prior to, and independent of, capital. Capital is only the fruit of labor, and could never have existed if labor had not first existed. Labor is the superior of capital, and deserves much the higher consideration." - Abraham Lincoln

5. "Poorly paid labor is inefficient labor, the world over." - Henry George

6. "The labor movement was the principal force that transforme¬≠d misery and despair into hope and progress." - Martin Luther King, Jr.

7. "Labour was the first price, the original purchase - money that was paid for all things. It was not by gold or by silver, but by labour, that all wealth of the world was originally purchased." - Adam Smith

8. "Labor disgraces no man; unfortunately, you occasionally find men who disgrace labor." - Ulysses S. Grant

9. "The wealth of a country is its working people." - Theodor Herzl

10. "Let the workers organize. Let the toilers assemble. Let their crystallized voice proclaim their injustices and demand their privileges. Let all thoughtful citizens sustain them, for the future of Labor is the future of America." - John L. Lewis

11. "It is one of the characteristics of a free and democratic nation that it have free and independent labor unions." - Franklin D. Roosevelt

12. "Where trade unions are most firmly organized, there are the rights of the people most respected." - Samuel Gompers

13. "Organized labor is the only way to have fair distribution of wealth." - Dolores Huerta

14. "Every man is dishonest who lives upon the labor of others, no matter if he occupies a throne." - Robert Green Ingersoll

15. "The labor movement is organized upon a principle that the strong shall help the weak." - John L. Lewis

16. "Labor Day is devoted to no man, living or dead, to no sect, race or nation." - Samuel Gompers

17. "May Day is a time to celebrate the power of collective action to create a better world." - Helen Keller

18. "No business which depends for existence on paying less than living wages to its workers has any right to continue in this country... By living wages I mean more than a bare subsistence level - I mean the wages of decent living." - Franklin D. Roosevelt

19. "May Day is a day to celebrate the achievements of workers and to renew our commitment to the fight for justice." - Dolores Huerta

20. "With all their faults, trade-unions have done more for humanity than any other organization of men that ever existed." - Clarence Darrow

Inspirational Labor Day Quotes

1. "No great achievement is possible without persistent work." - Bertrand Russell

2. "He who works with his hands and his head and his heart is an artist" - Francis of Assisi

3. "The one thing that matters is the effort." - Antoine de Saint-Exupery

4. "One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man." - Elbert Hubbard

5. "It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things." - Theodore Roosevelt

6. "Work isn't to make money; you work to justify life." - Marc Chagall

7. "You've got to stand for something or you'll fall for anything." - Ginger Rogers

13. ‚ÄúHard work beats talent when talent doesn‚Äôt work hard.‚Äù - Tim Notke

14. ‚ÄúI never dreamed about success. I worked for it.‚Äù - Est√©e Lauder

scraped_articles.content:
7 How to Last Longer in Bed Naturally: Exercise Home Remedies

Research suggests that exercise can help men and women last longer during sexuality. Lasting longer in bed is a desire shared by many individuals. It can significantly contribute to a delightful and fulfilling sexual life.

7 How to Last Longer in Bed Naturally: Exercise Home Remedies

In contrast, various factors are at play, including emotional and psychological aspects.

But physical fitness also plays a vital role in improving sexual endurance. It has been found that running, yoga, and pelvic floor exercises are beneficial for the body. In this article, we will explore eight natural home remedies through activities. These can help you last longer in bed and enrich your sexual stamina.

Let's check out some tricks on how to last longer in bed naturally using exercise, compiled from numerous sources, Tuesday (12/09/2023).

pexels-ketut-subiyanto-

1. Perform Cardio to Improve Heart Health

Cardiovascular health is a crucial factor in sexual stamina. Regular cardio exercises, such as running, swimming, or cycling. These exercises can improve blood circulation, boost endurance, and increase your overall energy in the bedroom. Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate-intensity cardio exercise most days of the week.

The pelvic floor muscles play a vital role in sexual performance. Strengthening these muscles can help delay ejaculation and improve control. Kegel exercises are an effective way to target the pelvic floor. To perform Kegels, squeeze your pelvic muscles as if trying to stop urine flow. Then hold for 5-10 seconds, and then release. Repeat this exercise for ten repetitions a few times a day.

2. Strengthen Your Pelvic Floor Muscles

Yoga is a holistic practice that benefits the mind and body. It enhances flexibility, reduces stress, and improves body awareness. All of which can positively impact sexual performance.

3. Yoga

Specific yoga poses and breathing techniques can help improve stamina and control in bed. Consider combining yoga into your daily routine for overall physical and mental well-being.

Photo:¬†pixabay/Maxhomefitness

ruslan-zh-unsplash

4. Pigeon Pose, Hold for 1 Minute on Each Side

The Pigeon pose is a yoga posture that stretches the hips and pelvic region. This pose helps to release tension and improve flexibility. By practicing this pose, you can enhance your physical endurance. This also reduces discomfort during relations. Hold the Pigeon pose on each side daily for one minute to experience its benefits.

5. Kegels

Kegels are not just for women; they are equally beneficial for men. These exercises strengthen the pubococcygeus (PC) muscle, which plays a critical role in sexual performance.

To perform Kegels, tighten your PC muscle.

Then, hold for 5-10 seconds and release. Aim for 10 Kegels with 5-10 second holds daily to improve control and stamina.

How to Last Longer in Bed Naturally

Squats are a fantastic lower-body exercise. It can also contribute to improved sexual stamina. Squats engage the glutes, quads, and hamstrings.

6. Squats

This exercise strengthens the muscles essential for keeping certain sexual positions and movements. To perform squats, stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Then, lower your body by bending your knees. Next step, return to a standing position. Start with 10-15 squats and gradually increase the repetitions as your strength improves.
Photo: pexels-ketut-subiyanto

7. Push-ups

Push-ups may not seem directly related to sexual endurance. But they are excellent for overall upper-body strength and body stability. A strong upper body can enhance your power to support different intimate positions.

Photo:¬†jonathan-borba-unsplash

Push-ups can improve overall physical stamina. To do push-ups, take a plank position with your hands shoulder-width apart. After that, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground, and push back up. Start with 10-15 push-ups and gradually increase the repetitions over time.

Photo:¬†pexels-andrej-klintsy-

In addition to exercise, maintaining a healthy lifestyle is essential for lasting longer in bed. This includes getting enough sleep and controlling stress through relaxation techniques.

8. Keep a Healthy Lifestyle

You should also avoid extreme alcohol and tobacco use. A balanced lifestyle supports physical and emotional well-being. These are both critical factors in sexual performance.

Photo:¬†pexels-miriam-alonso

Incorporate these exercises and lifestyle adjustments into your routine. These tricks on how to last longer in bed are for overall physical health.

These tips can also improve your sexual stamina. Remember that sexual performance is a personal matter. There is no one-size-fits-all solution. What works best for you may vary, so be patient with yourself and your partner. You can explore and implement these changes. Finally, the goal is to create a fulfilling and enjoyable sexual experience for you and your partner.

Flowers Quotes Fun Facts to Brighten Your Day

Here, we'll explore¬†the world of flower quotes and discover the wisdom and beauty they hold.

Flowers Quotes Fun Facts to Brighten Your Day

Did you know that there are over 400,000 types of flowering plants in the world?

Or can sunflowers grow up to twelve feet tall? Flowers quotes often remind us of the wonder and joy flowers bring our lives. From famous poets to everyday people, many have expressed their thoughts and feelings through beautiful flower quotes.

Flowers hold a special place in our hearts, whether it‚Äôs the vibrant colors, sweet fragrances, or delicate petals.

They are not just pretty. They are also intriguing and full of surprises! Hence, they have sparked countless flowers quotes throughout history.

Let‚Äôs dive into the world of flowers quotes and discover the wisdom and beauty they hold.




Flowers Quotes

Flowers Quotes about Growth

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúFlowers grow back, even after they are stepped on. So will I.‚Äù ‚Äî Unknown

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúWhen a flower doesn‚Äôt bloom, you fix the environment in which it grows, not the flower.‚Äù ‚Äî Alexander Den Heijer

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúOne person‚Äôs weed is another person‚Äôs wildflower.‚Äù ‚Äî Susan Wittig Albert

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the time that you spent on your rose that makes your rose so important.‚Äù ‚Äî Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúLove is like dried flowers sometimes. Even though you watch the petals shrink and change colour, you cannot help treasuring them.‚Äù ‚Äî Munia Khan

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúLike wildflowers; You must allow yourself to grow in all the places people thought you never would.‚Äù ‚Äî E.V.

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúAll the flowers of the tomorrows are in the seeds of today.‚Äù ‚Äî Indian Proverb

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúNo matter how chaotic it is, wildflowers will still spring up in the middle of nowhere.‚Äù ‚Äî Sheryl Crow

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúEven the tiniest of flowers can have the toughest roots.‚Äù ‚Äî Shannon Mullen

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúA flower blossoms for its own joy.‚Äù ‚Äî Oscar Wilde

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúIf you tend to a flower, it will bloom, no matter how many weeds surround it.‚Äù ‚Äî Matshona Dhliwayo

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúI am in awe of flowers. Not because of their colors, but because even though they have dirt in their roots, they still grow. They still bloom.‚Äù ‚Äî Antoinette Foy

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúOne by one she slew her fears and then planted a flower garden over their graves.‚Äù ‚Äî John Green

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúFlowers don‚Äôt worry about how they‚Äôre going to bloom. They just open up and turn toward the light and that makes them beautiful.‚Äù ‚Äî Jim Carrey

Inspiring Flowers Quotes

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúA flower can be defined by its unique beauty and an incredible allure.‚Äù ‚Äî Happiness Shuma

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúYou can cut all the flowers, but you cannot keep spring from coming.‚Äù ‚Äî Pablo Neruda

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúIf you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.‚Äù ‚Äî Frances Hodgson Burnett



Flowers Quotes

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúA flower‚Äôs appeal is in its contradictions‚Äîso delicate in form yet strong in fragrance, so small in size yet big in beauty, so short in life yet long on effect.‚Äù ‚Äî Terri Guillemets

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúEvery flower blooms in its own time.‚Äù ‚Äî Ken Petti

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúWhere flowers bloom so does hope.‚Äù ‚Äî Lady Johnson

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúI must have flowers, always, and always.‚Äù ‚Äî Claude Monet

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúFlowers grow out of dark moments.‚Äù ‚Äî Corita Kent

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúWhat a lonely place it would be to have a world without a wildflower!‚Äù ‚Äî Roland R. Kemler

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúMinds are like flowers; they open only when the time is right.‚Äù ‚Äî Stephen Richards

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre only here for a short visit. Don‚Äôt hurry, don‚Äôt worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.‚Äù ‚Äî Walter Hagen

Inspiring Flowers Quotes

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúDon't let the tall weeds cast a shadow on the beautiful flowers in your garden.‚Äù ‚Äî Steve Maraboli

Flowers Quotes¬†
